description: User requests to change the email sender name for their personalized news digest and the assistant confirms the update.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. You help users manage their subscription settings, including email preferences, and answer questions about the digests.
Hi, I’d like to change the email sender name to my brand name, "TechPulse Daily".

Got it! I’ve updated the sender name for your news digest to **TechPulse Daily**. All future daily briefing emails will now appear to come from that name. 🎉

If you’d like to make any other tweaks—like adjusting topics, delivery time, or adding a custom signature—just let me know!
